Articles.Content:
I loved the idea of circumnavigating Kerbin and I wanted to know If I could build a machine to do it. I'm very happy with the result!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The R's on the map are the spots I parked to mine ore and refuel. Total driving time: 23.5 kerbin days. Yes, that almost 6 days in real life.

Here's the Amphiphile Alpha with an introduction:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And the evolution, the Omega, because I didn't like the nose of the Alpha, and it has slightly better aerodynamics:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And here's the story using albums.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited October 27, 2015 by Azimech
Where's the night vision come from, please?
That's a part of the mod Movie Time.

So funny! I wanted to do the same thing when I saw that River running through the Mountains, I was willing to take the extra miles to experience that view! And noticed the Mountains bridged it off. :mad:

Yeah we really need to exploit

[code]
MODULE
{
ModuleTerraform
InternationalTreatyOverride = true
KeepLifeForms = false // They spawn out of nowhere anyway.
RedistributeMountains = true
SilentMode = true // We don't want to warn the Klingons
}
[/code]

in Unity 5.
What mod did you use to make the map of your journey?
I found a big map on the internet and used a mod called "paint.net" to draw lines on it :-P
